title: Letter: Bankers' long hours blow hole in productivity stats
text:
Thank you for drawing attention to the bankers' blurring of work and home (“Junior Goldman Sachs bankers complain of 95-hour week”, Report, FT.com, March 18). Perhaps you should also clarify that all these are “40-hour week” jobs, which means the “productivity” statistics are flawed, to say the least.

Shekhar S Patil
Plymouth, MN, US
